title: Avalanche
brief_description: Filmed on location in the Austrian Tyrol, “Avalanche” is an action packed tale of adventure on a snow holiday. Despite strict regulations imposed by their teacher, two boys set out to climb the mountain. Disaster and gripping drama follow. Rated: G
